heading: 2 Introduction
text: Bioconductor project promotes high-quality, well documented, interoperable software. guidelines help achieve objective; meant put undue burden package authors, authors difficultly satisfying guidelines seek advice bioc-devel mailing list.Package maintainers urged follow guidelines closely possible developing Bioconductor packages.General instructions producing packages can found Writing R Extensions manual, available within R (RShowDoc("R-exts")) R web site.Remember minimum requirements package acceptance package still subject guidelines formal technical review trained Bioconductor package reviewer.
